overview:
Adam Cole is the Senior Director and Head of North American Sales for Socialbakers. He leads the strategy and team responsible for building and maintaining customer relationships across the United States and Canada.

Prior to his role with Socialbakers, he was the Director of Sales for Vizu Corporation where he was charged with developing partnerships with industry-leading publishers, ad networks and ad exchanges. Adam is a start-up veteran and his experience also consists of senior roles at Experian Hitwise and MyNewPlace.com.

relationships.title: Sr. Director - Head of Sales, North America
